description: This file defines a template class 'PingPongDisabled' within the 'WebSockets' namespace, intended to disable ping-pong functionality for WebSocket connections. It includes a constructor, a protected destructor, a placeholder 'startPing' method, and deletes the copy constructor and assignment operator.

classes.name: WebSockets::PingPongDisabled
classes.description: A template class that provides a disabled ping-pong mechanism for WebSocket connections, intended to be inherited or used where ping-pong functionality is to be suppressed.

methods.name: PingPongDisabled
methods.description: Default constructor for the PingPongDisabled class.

methods.name: ~PingPongDisabled
methods.description: Protected default destructor, preventing destruction outside class hierarchy.

methods.name: void startPing(ConnectionHandler handler)
methods.description: Method intended to initiate a ping, but currently implemented as a no-op.
